title: Blue Whales: Giant Mammals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 214 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 440L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     R and Z
description: Blue whales are the largest animals on Earth, but there are many other interesting things to learn about them. In this book, students will read about how these animals breathe, how they eat, and more. Pictures enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
